title: re: Humorous type video... your thoughts...
content:
Hello,

I just saw this humorous type related video:

[http://www.creativepro.com/article/font-conference-disrupted-kidnapper](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122003518/http:/www.creativepro.com/article/font-conference-disrupted-kidnapper "http://www.creativepro.com/article/font-conference-disrupted-kidnapper")

What is your take on this video? I think our Typophile community could create a funnier and more incisive video.

Regards,

Sal Randazzo

 [‹ Gentium looks bad in Word but nice on paper](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122003518/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47525 "Go to previous forum topic") [CitiBank Font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122003518/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47826 "Go to next forum topic")
author: sal_randazzo

comments.content: Amused! Pretty clever stuff. Thanks for posting.
Highly entertaining. Best bit was ’not now Futura’.
I have seen the video and it is fun : Only system fonts in it :-)
So, which one of you wants to become a sans-serif?

I am already a sans Hairif :-)

ChrisL
